Original: Deal sneak attack damage when you charge.|Enemies with Uncanny Dodge are immune to this.
Translation: 衝鋒攻擊時造成偷襲傷害，|擁有直覺閃避的目標對此能力免疫

Original: Bards can wear light armour without risking|spell failure.
Translation: 詩人可以在穿著輕甲和盾牌時|忽視以此帶來的法術失敗率

Original: Counter magical effects that depend on sound.|Allies within 30ft use Performance roll in place of a saving throw
Translation: 反制依賴於聽覺的法術，30呎之內的盟友|可以用吟遊詩人的表演檢定來代替自身的豁免檢定

Original: Ranger bonus feats can be taken without the normal pre-requisites,|but only apply when not wearing heavy armour.
Translation: 根據自己的戰鬥流派選擇獎勵專長，即使自身沒有達到|該專長的先決條件，不穿戴重甲時才有效

Original: Cut out carefully with a sharp knife or scissors,|using the      marks as guides
Translation: 依照標示線，|用剪刀或刀片小心切開。

Original: Immune to all diseases including magic.
Translation: 免疫所有疾病，包括魔法疾病

Original: Apply a critical effect to the|second sneak attack in a round
Translation: 目標同一輪第二次被偷襲時|附加重擊專長效果

Original: for every 10ft of your standard move above 30ft
Translation: 超過30呎的基本速度，每10呎獲得種族加值

Original: Sneak attack damage can be applied when a target is flanked oris denied their DEX bonus to AC.|On ranged attacks, it only applies within 30 ft.|It is not multiplied by critical hits.|It cannot be non-lethal unless using a non-lethal weapon.
Translation: 目標無法應用敏捷加值在AC上或是被夾擊時可以偷襲|遠程攻擊在30呎內才算作偷襲|偷襲傷害不會因重擊翻倍|使用非致命武器才能非致命偷襲
基本|攻擊加值/|武僧等級

Original: Treat unarmed attacks as adamantine weapons
Translation: 徒手攻擊被視為精金武器

Original: Saving throw = 10 + Casting Stat + Spell Level
Translation: 豁免檢定 = 10 + 施法屬性 + 法術環數

Original: Spells from your opposed schools cost two slots to prepare.
Translation: 準備對立學派法術則必須付出兩倍的同級法術位

Original: Apply a critical effect to the 2nd sneak attack
Translation: 第二次偷襲附加重擊專長效果

Original: Counter any identified spell of a level less than the number of|rounds of performance, as Dispel Magic
Translation: 反制任何已成功辨識的法術，其環數必須小於他持續|表演的輪數，視同解除魔法
所有豁免檢定|獲得加值

Original: Monk bonus applies when|unarmoured and unencumbered
Translation: 武僧加值只在|無著甲、無負重時生效

Original: if you fail a jump by 4 or less
Translation: 如果跳遠檢定失敗但差值小於4

Original: Fold along the dotted lines, making sure|the                hatched areas are hidden or|face down
Translation: 沿著虛線對折，|確保陰影區域超內或是朝下。

Original: second sneak attack in a round
Able to take 10 on any skill

Translation: 提高傷害減免到10 / 邪惡

Original: Apply a critical effect to the
Speak with animals of its kind

Sneak attack damage can be applied when a target is flanked or|is denied their DEX bonus to AC.|On ranged attacks, it only applies within 30 ft.|It is not multiplied by critical hits.|It cannot be non-lethal unless using a non-lethal weapon.
Translation: 目標無法應用敏捷加值在AC上或是被夾擊時可以偷襲|遠程攻擊在30呎內才算作偷襲|偷襲傷害不會因重擊翻倍|使用非致命武器才能非致命偷襲

Original: Sneak attack damage can be applied when a target|is flanked or is denied their DEX bonus to AC.|On ranged attacks, it only applies within 30 ft.|It is not multiplied by critical hits.|It cannot be non-lethal unless using a non-lethal|weapon.
Translation: 目標無法應用敏捷加值在AC上|或是被夾擊時可以偷襲|遠程攻擊在30呎內才算作偷襲|偷襲傷害不會因重擊翻倍|使用非致命武器才能非致命|偷襲

Original: Can only be permanently killed by a coup-de-grace or|critical hit with an artefact.
Translation: 只能被神器的致命一擊（coup de grace）或重擊殺死

Original: As a move action, detect evil in one creature or item within 60ft.
Translation: 一個移動動作對60呎內的單一物體或生物偵測邪惡

Original: A successful sneak attack can also deliver one of:| • Sleep for 1d4 hours| • Paralysed for 2d6 rounds| • Slain
Translation: 每次造成偷襲傷害時選擇造成目標:| • 睡眠1d4小時| • 麻痺2d6輪| • 直接被殺死
忽略最開始的10尺墜落距離

Original: (1 pt to fix as a move action)
Spell Save DC = 10 + CHA + Spell Level
Translation: 法術豁免DC = 10 + CHA + 法術環數

Original: Counter magical effects that depend on sight.|Allies within 30ft use Performance roll in place of a saving throw
Translation: 反制依賴於視覺的法術，30呎之內的盟友|可以用吟遊詩人的表演檢定來代替自身的豁免檢定
